attributes.action: campaign for more people to start smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lets get everyone smoking, it is easier to start than stop after all, start by offering free ciggies at school(catch em young)that way if every one smokes there will be no problems with smoking in pubs, restaurants and hospitals, just think of the extra revenue you will earn mr brown

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
